# Data Processing

```{r load_data,cache=TRUE}
storms <- read.csv(bzfile("StormData.csv.bz2"))
```

```{r preprocess}
library(plyr)
health <- ddply(storms,.(EVTYPE),summarize,tot.fatalities=sum(FATALITIES),tot.injuries=sum(INJURIES))
```
